lom:description.lom:string:
Commercial website with useful information about how boron is is obtained and its use in agriculture. Boron is one of seven essential micronutrients - vital to fertilization, fruit and seed production. But it's a micronutrient with macro effects. Boron deficiency is the most widespread of all crop deficiencies, affecting almost all major crops grown around the world.
Borax is the world's leading supplier of borates into the agricultural industry.
